name: Halfway There
description:
Halfway There

You wake up at noon and have a few tasks around the house to do. Hopefully you can finish them all...

How to Play:

  • Move right: "right" or "d"
  • Move left: "left" or "a"
  • Interact: "up" or "w"
  • Interact with doors, tasks around the house, or even the menu buttons.
Note:

Halfway There was created as part of a jam-style project in CS315: Game Programming at Ball State University. All code and assets were created in the span of one week.
